name: Miles McKenna
introduction: Miles McKenna is an actor and social media icon known for his comedic voice and LGBTQ+ advice and activism. Miles can be seen on the Hulu comedy series "Grad Night" and Season 2 of Verizon Go90's "Now We Are Talking." In 2017, Miles headlined two nation-wide tours that covered a total 35 shows and starred in the AT&T scripted drama series entitled "Guilty Party" which debuted on YouTube.
